resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108158</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108158</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207155</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Eyewitness Accounts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Augenzeuge-Konten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comptes de Témoin oculaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Clientes Da Testemunha ocular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Clienti Del Testimone oculare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απολογισμοί αυτοπτών μαρτύρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuentas Del Testigo presencial</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features more than a dozen moments in history -- Washington's worry that Britain was spreading smallpox among American troops (1775), Jefferson's observations of the French revolution (1789), Truman's first meeting with Stalin (1945), and others.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kennzeichnet mehr als Momente Dutzend in der 
Geschichte -- Sorge Washingtons daß Großbritannien verbritt Pocken 
unter amerikanischen Truppen (1775), Beobachtungen Jeffersons der 
Französischen Revolution (1789), Trumans erste Sitzung mit Stalin 
(1945), und andere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comporte plus que les moments une douzaine dans 
l'histoire -- le souci de Washington que la Grande-Bretagne propageait
la variole parmi les troupes américaines (1775), les observations de 
Jefferson de la révolution française (1789), la première réunion 
de Truman avec Stalin (1945), et d'autres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caracteriza mais do que os momentos uma dúzia no 
history -- preocupação de Washington que Grâ Bretanha espalhava o 
smallpox entre tropas americanas (1775), observações de Jefferson da
volta francesa (1789), primeira reunião de Truman com Stalin (1945), 
e outros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratterizza più dei momenti un dozzina nella 
storia -- preoccupazione de Washington che la Gran-Bretagna stava 
propagando la vaiolo tra le truppe americane (1775), osservazioni del 
Jefferson della rivoluzione francese (1789), prima riunione del Truman
con Stalin (1945) ed altri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει περισσότερο από δωδεκάες στιγμές στην 
ιστορία -- ανησυχία της Ουάσιγκτον ότι η Μεγάλη Βρετανία 
διέδιδε την ευλογιά μεταξύ των αμερικανικών στρατευμάτων 
(1775), των παρατηρήσεων Jefferson της γαλλικής επανάστασης 
(1789), της πρώτης συνεδρίασης του Truman με το Στάλιν 
(1945), και άλλες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece más que los momentos una docena en 
historia -- la preocupación de Washington que Gran Bretaña separaba 
viruela entre las tropas americanas (1775), las observaciones de 
Jefferson de la revolución francesa (1789), la primera reunión de 
Truman con Stalin (1945), y otros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207155</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108158</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/eyewitness-accounts</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
